titles.title: Give Families Better Tools to Save for Education Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the contribution limit for Coverdell education savings accounts from $2,000 to $10,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/12/2012--Introduced. Give Families Better Tools to Save for Education Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the limitation on contributions to a tax-exempt Coverdell education savings account from $2,000 to $10,000.
